summary: Set of oriental-styled shields from Hammerfell
descriptionHtml:
In continue of building Hammerfell armoury.

Previous items:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60454/?]Engraved shamshir[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60660/?]Engraved bow[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60896/?]Unique scimitars[/url]

Set of 6 oriental-styled shields made from different materials.
They are well balanced (on my taste), have detailed 2k textures and completely lore-friendly design.
Most of them can be found in steel section, except the black one in ebony section.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60900/?]Patch for using with Dual Sheath Redux[/url] by DigitalVixen
author: farinelli
